title: Joy of growing: health - the dirt-witch cleans up
creator_credit: Paul Ferrara, Warren Brown and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Promotes good health habits and cleanliness in a fantasy about a witch who casts spells to make others as dirty and miserable as she is. Suitable for upper primary level.
